title: 93x13: Applicability of 18 U.S.C. § 207(c) Restrictions; Post-Employment Activity; ES-5 Pay Scale
summary: The OGE Director can grant a waiver to 18 U.S.C. § 207(c) restrictions if the restrictions impose undue hardship on the requesting agency, and that granting a waiver would not create the potential for undue influence or unfair advantage. An exemption was never requested of the agency, and is not applied for individuals.
